meanings: (방향, 위치) bearing, point of the compass

vlive.korean: 빌런 엑소? 방위대 엑소? 누굴 골라야 하죠? Villain EXO? Defense force EXO? Who should I pick? 듣기 View video V CREW : [V CREW] 붐보의 서재 - EP. 06 엑소 정규 6집 언박싱! (덕질 과몰입해서 이중자아 돼버린 붐보&보붐⁉️)
vlive.english: Villain EXO? Defense force EXO? Who should I pick?

vlive.korean: 지구방위대 한번 가? Shall we do the "Fresh Men" pose? 듣기 View video MAP6 : MAP6 TV 복습하기 EP.009 몰래카메라 2부
vlive.english: Shall we do the "Fresh Men" pose?

vlive.korean: 저도 방위 출신입니다. I'm also from the defense corps. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : 언타이틀 - '임도혁 + 헤일로와 함께하는 언타이틀'
vlive.english: I'm also from the defense corps.

vlive.korean: 우리 이번에 약간 지구방위대 콘셉트이니까. Our concept is kind of like "Power Rangers". 듣기 View video EXO : exokai
vlive.english: Our concept is kind of like "Power Rangers".

vlive.korean: 너 방이 뭔데? - 내 방 위에 플라밍고 있잖아 조명. What about your room? - I have the Flamingo lighting. 듣기 View video TWICE : 간게나연
vlive.english: What about your room? - I have the Flamingo lighting.
